title: Oliver Dowden – 2023 Speech on Cyber Operations
author: admin
summary: The speech made by Oliver Dowden, the Deputy Prime Minister, on 7 December 2023.
content:
Of all the risks that this country faces… there are none that are evolving more rapidly than those in the cyber domain.
  *[ISIL]: Islamic State of Iraq and the Levant
  *[SDGs]: Sustainable Development Goals
  *[IMF]: International Monetary Fund
  *[UN]: United Nations
  *[GDP]: Gross Domestic Product
  *[UCL]: University College London

  *[IMF]: International Monetary Fund
  *[UN]: United Nations
  *[GDP]: Gross Domestic Product
  *[UCL]: University College London
  *[HIV]: human immunodeficiency virus

  *[SDGs]: Sustainable Development Goals
  *[IMF]: International Monetary Fund
  *[UN]: United Nations
  *[GDP]: Gross Domestic Product
  *[UCL]: University College London

  *[UN]: United Nations
  *[GDP]: Gross Domestic Product

  *[UN]: United Nations
  *[GDP]: Gross Domestic Product

  *[IMF]: International Monetary Fund
  *[UN]: United Nations
  *[GDP]: Gross Domestic Product

  *[UN]: United Nations

  *[UN]: United Nations
